exceptions.exn: In environment P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Rbar_abs ?M2365 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball 0 eps y -> (fun x : R => (fun u : R => 0 < u) x -> P x) y".
